string-array.name: summary_list
string-array.item: A focus on computer science with knowledge in C++, C, Java, Visual Basic, and Scheme
Together with my side projects, and my academic knowledge I have strong basis for te computer science field
A co-op work term at Kik as a release and QA engineer has given me the knowledge of designing a mobile application

string-array.name: kik_descrip
string-array.item: Each release cycle was made the test lead for features, and was responsible for making sure that feature was bug free
Wrote detailed test suites, that would throughly test the feature
Responsible for the release of each upgrade making sure the upgrade would go smoothly

string-array.name: open_descip
string-array.item: Responsible for first and second level support for tools that were used throughout the Open Text Research and Development department
Have experience using and managing JIRA, ChangePoint and Confluence tools
Responsible for testing new features for the Open Text Test Repository
